Most likely the first boss you will encounter in Cataclysm.
Highly recommended to bring Fire Resistance potions as the Netherite Monstrosity spits out lava from its mouth during the boss fight.
The second boss you will encounter. Has two phases.
Highly recommended to bring Fire Resistance and Health Regeneration potions. High armor will not save you from the armor strip of a certain impaling attack.
